name: Erotic art for Boobs 'em up - Wallpaper
detailed_description:
This DLC include a collection of 5 wallpapers with erotic character from the game Boobs 'em up for your desktop.

In this DLC, you will find:
5 wallpapers in .PNG format, with the resolution 1920x1080
All wallpapers are on the transparent background.

The content of this DLC will be placed in your Boobs 'em up folder in the Steam Directory: …\Steam\SteamApps\common\Boobs em up\Wallpapers

short_description: This DLC include a collection of 5 wallpapers with erotic character from the game Boobs 'em up for your desktop
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Personage on those wallpapers is naked
